## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines in CLAUDE.md
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] Code passes linting (`bun run lint` and `cargo clippy -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`bun run test:run` and `cargo test`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation (CLAUDE.md) if behavior changed
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
